sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: What to Expect from Montana Technologies's Earnings
feed.summary: Montana Technologies (NASDAQ: AIRJ) is scheduled to release its quarterly earnings report on November 13, 2025. Analysts anticipate an EPS of $-0.09. Investors will be keenly watching for whether the company beats this estimate and provides positive guidance for the upcoming quarter, as guidance often impacts stock prices more than historical performance.

feed.title: Montana Technologies Announces Private Placement Financing
feed.summary: Montana Technologies Corporation announced a private placement financing (PIPE) totaling approximately $12 million from existing and new investors. The proceeds from this financing will be used to accelerate the commercialization of its AirJoule® system, which addresses global water scarcity and demand for comfort cooling. AirJoule® technology harvests water vapor from ambient air to produce dehumidified air and pure, PFAS-free distilled water, with initial target markets including air conditioning, atmospheric water harvesting, and data center cooling.

feed.title: Montana Technologies Corp (AIRJ) Live Share Price, Invest From India
feed.summary: This article provides a detailed financial overview of Montana Technologies Corp (AIRJ), including its live share price, performance metrics, fundamentals, historical returns, and comparison with peers. It also includes quarterly and annual profit/loss statements, cash flow data, and investor sentiment. The company is described as a water harvesting technology firm focused on atmospheric water generation and HVAC energy reduction.

feed.title: Montana Technologies Announces First Quarter 2024 Results
feed.summary: Montana Technologies Corporation announced its first-quarter 2024 results, highlighted by the completion of its business combination and Nasdaq listing under ticker "AIRJ". The company secured $37 million in cash and formed strategic joint ventures with GE Vernova and Carrier for the commercialization of its AirJoule® technology in HVAC and atmospheric water harvesting.

feed.title: Montana Technologies Corp. Expands Management Team with Key Appointments
feed.summary: Montana Technologies Corp. (NASDAQ: AIRJ) announced key appointments to its management team, including Stephen Pang as Chief Financial Officer, Chad MacDonald as Chief Legal Officer, and Tom Divine as Vice President, Investor Relations and Finance. Jeff Gutke, former CFO, will transition to Chief Administrative Officer, and Pat Eilers will serve as Executive Chairman. These additions are aimed at strengthening the company as it scales its operations and addresses global demand for water and air conditioning.

feed.title: Montana Technologies Corporation's (NASDAQ:AIRJ) top owners are private equity firms with 42% stake, while 30% is held by individual investors
feed.summary: Private equity firms own 42% of Montana Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ:AIRJ), making them the largest shareholder group and giving them significant influence over management and business strategy. Individual investors hold 30% of the company, while insiders own 15%, equating to a US$90 million stake in the US$592 million business. The top three shareholders collectively own 62% of the company.
